ps3.4:1.2_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci balakaraṇīyā kammantā karīyanti, sabbe te pathaviṁ nissāya pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya evamete balakaraṇīyā kammantā karīyanti;
ps3.4:1.3_0: evamevaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāveti, ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bahulīkaroti.
ps3.4:2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāveti, ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bahulīkaroti?
ps3.4:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vosaggapariṇāmiṁ.
ps3.4:2.9_0: sammāsamādhiṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vosaggapariṇāmiṁ.
ps3.4:2.10_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāveti, ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bahulīkaroti.
ps3.4:3.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti, sabbe te pathaviṁ nissāya pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya evamete bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti;
ps3.4:3.2_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvento ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bahulīkaronto vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesu.
ps3.4:4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvento ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bahulīkaronto vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesu?
ps3.4:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vosaggapariṇāmiṁ.
ps3.4:4.9_0: sammāsamādhiṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vosaggapariṇāmiṁ.
ps3.4:4.10_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvento ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bahulīkaronto vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesū”ti.
ps3.4:5.1_0: Sammādiṭṭhiyā pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.
ps3.4:5.8_0: sammāsamādhissa pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.
ps3.4:6.3_0: Vikkhambhanaviveko ca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ bhāvayato, tadaṅgaviveko ca diṭṭhigatānaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato, samucchedaviveko ca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhiviveko ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇaviveko ca nirodho nibbānaṁ.
ps3.4:6.5_0: Imesu pañcasu vivekesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
ps3.4:7.3_0: Vikkhambhanavirāgo ca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ bhāvayato, tadaṅgavirāgo ca diṭṭhigatānaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato, samucchedavirāgo ca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhivirāgo ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇavirāgo ca nirodho nibbānaṁ.
ps3.4:7.5_0: Imesu pañcasu virāgesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
ps3.4:8.3_0: Vikkhambhananirodho ca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ bhāvayato, tadaṅganirodho ca diṭṭhigatānaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato, samucchedanirodho ca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhinirodho ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇanirodho ca amatā dhātu.
ps3.4:8.5_0: Imesu pañcasu nirodhesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
ps3.4:9.3_0: Vikkhambhanavosaggo ca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ bhāvayato, tadaṅgavosaggo ca diṭṭhigatānaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato, samucchedavosaggo ca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhivosaggo ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇavosaggo ca nirodho nibbānaṁ.
ps3.4:9.5_0: Imesu pañcasu vosaggesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
ps3.4:9.6_0: Sammādiṭṭhiyā ime pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.
ps3.4:10.9_0: Vikkhambhanaviveko ca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ bhāvayato, tadaṅgaviveko ca diṭṭhigatānaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato, samucchedaviveko ca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhiviveko ca phalakkhaṇe nissaraṇaviveko ca nirodho nibbānaṁ.
ps3.4:10.11_0: Imesu pañcasu vivekesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
ps3.4:11.3_0: Vikkhambhanavirāgo ca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ bhāvayato, tadaṅgavirāgo ca diṭṭhigatānaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato, samucchedavirāgo ca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhivirāgo ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇavirāgo ca nirodho nibbānaṁ.
ps3.4:11.5_0: Imesu pañcasu virāgesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
ps3.4:12.3_0: Vikkhambhananirodho ca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ bhāvayato, tadaṅganirodho ca diṭṭhigatānaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato, samucchedanirodho ca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhinirodho ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇanirodho ca amatā dhātu.
ps3.4:12.5_0: Imesu pañcasu nirodhesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
ps3.4:13.3_0: Vikkhambhanavosaggo ca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ bhāvayato, tadaṅgavosaggo ca diṭṭhigatānaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato, samucchedavosaggo ca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhivosaggo ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇavosaggo ca nirodho nibbānaṁ.
ps3.4:13.5_0: Imesu pañcasu vosaggesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
ps3.4:13.6_0: Sammāsamādhissa ime pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.
ps3.4:14.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci balakaraṇīyā kammantā karīyanti, sabbe te pathaviṁ nissāya pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya evamete balakaraṇīyā kammantā karīyanti;
ps3.4:14.2_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya satta bojjhaṅge bhāveti, satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaroti …pe…
ps3.4:14.3_0: satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesu …pe…
ps3.4:14.4_0: pañca balāni bhāveti, pañca balāni bahulīkaroti …pe…
ps3.4:14.5_0: pañca balāni bhāvento pañca balāni bahulīkaronto vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesu …pe…
ps3.4:15.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti, sabbe te pathaviṁ nissāya pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya evamete bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti;
ps3.4:15.2_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya pañcindriyāni bhāvento pañcindriyāni bahulīkaronto vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesu.
ps3.4:16.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya pañcindriyāni bhāvento pañcindriyāni bahulīkaronto vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesu?
ps3.4:16.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhindriyaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vosaggapariṇāmiṁ.
ps3.4:16.6_0: paññindriyaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vosaggapariṇāmiṁ.
ps3.4:16.7_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya …pe…
ps3.4:17.1_0: Saddhindriyassa pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.
ps3.4:17.5_0: paññindriyassa pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.
ps3.4:18.3_0: Vikkhambhanaviveko ca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ bhāvayato, tadaṅgaviveko ca diṭṭhigatānaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato, samucchedaviveko ca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhiviveko ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇaviveko ca nirodho nibbānaṁ.
ps3.4:18.5_0: Imesu pañcasu vivekesu chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ …pe…
ps3.4:18.6_0: saddhindriyassa ime pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.
ps3.4:19.6_0: paññindriyassa ime pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayāti.
